website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, stainless steel tongue cleaner with a simple yet effective design.
pros: Made entirely of surgical stainless steel to inhibit bacterial growth
Ergonomic ridged handles are easy to grip
Flexible design can be widened or narrowed
Smooth edges prevent cuts and scrapes
cons: Some feel the edges are a bit too blunt

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and Dr.Tungs since I couldnt decide which would be better... This one is wider and has a much longer handle than Dr.Tung. I initially really disliked this one because it was so wide (I'm a female about 5' 7" tall, not sure about my tongue size compared to others), felt like it was hard to manipulate, but once you get used to it it works fine. I think it comes down to preference, but its definitely bigger than Dr. Tungs
customer_reviews.author: Cola Koala

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: It's insane that I never realized how much gunk was on my tongue in the mornings. Pretty disgusting actually. My mouth feels extra clean after using this. Great quality stainless steel. To sanitize it, I just dip it in a pot of boiling water for a few minutes. The only thing others may have an issue with is storage as it doesn't come with a case or anything. Simple solution, though. I put up a small hook next to my toothpaste and toothbrush and hang it on that.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis T.

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product that REALLY freshens your breath
customer_reviews.text: I was used to plastic, and this is a quality metal tongue scraper. It feels heavy enough that the weight of the scraper can help you scrape. Its 'sharp' enough to get a lot of gunk. Its a great product that REALLY freshens your breath. The 1 con is that the gunk can fall off the scraper. My previous plastic one held on to the gunk til you run it under the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my oral hygiene regiment. You can never do enough when it comes to taking care of your breath and teeth and this simply adds to it. Didn't believe how much ''gunk'' was leftover in the mouth even after you brush, but other than visually seeing it, you can feel the difference in how your tongue feels after using this product. Not disappointed one bit for ordering this and will consider this user for other health associated needs!
customer_reviews.author: Juggernaut

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had one years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Love how it's not plastic. I've never used one before but it makes my mouth feel much more clean and less prone to bad breath. Woke up with significantly less morning breath. Don't press too hard. Never thought tongue scraping would be so satisfying, it's like popping a zit but much better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Hooray! Just in time for Valentine's day. 😝
customer_reviews.text: You know, it's pretty hard to smell your own breath, but I bought this due to my lingering paranoia that I have had bad breath my whole life and nobody has had that heart to tell me. I am that Keanu Reeves meme. So, now everyone can talk behind my back about how my lifelong halitosis has mysteriously been cured, and what a relief that is, because I do talk quite a lot (as you can see). Have a great day! 👄
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Falafel

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I’ve noticed a huge difference in my breath. Way better than the plastic ones I’ve bought in the past. Coming from a guy who self conscious about his breath. I’m much more confident talking to people in close spaces. Especially at the end of a long day of work....We will see how long this product holds up but since it’s metal I’m sure it will be around for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling Breath
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very useful. I used to use an oral B toothbrush for cleaning my tongue but the toothbrush frequently get mold growth on it. Also the bristles on the toothbrush was a breeding ground for bacteria and produced bad odors. Made the switch to this tongue cleaner and never looked back. Does it job. well and now I can more quickly and hygienically clean my tongue. Easy to clean and also do not have to replace it every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about buying this? Just use a spoon instead.
customer_reviews.text: This tongue cleaner is way to thick to scrape anything. I bought a really cheap one at local, generic 98c store and it CLEANS everything. It's really thin and flexible, allowing you to scrape almost all the gunk out. When I used this product, it feels like sticking a spoon down your throat. Why waste $7 when you can use a spoon that does the same job?
customer_reviews.author: Not Amazon Representative

customer_reviews.title: Great product that does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when it comes to trends but tongue scrapping appealed to me as my tongue seemed to have a white film that couldn't be brushed off and a vile taste.I had been juice fasting and this became extreme so i decided to give tongue scrapping a chance and in my experience this is a habit i will keep for life,a discolored mucus like film was removed and over the course of 3 days my tongue became very pink and soft were as before it was rough to the touch.I am glad I searched out a tongue scrapper of very high quality and have recommended this since to family members.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how this would feel or if it would be effective, but it is actually really amazing (especially compared to mouthwash or brushing your tongue). It doesn't hurt to use or clean and it is really effective - at least for my purposes. No bad side effects or weird aftertaste. I can't really attest to any of the bacteria inhibiting claims, but it definitely gets rid of any normal food or drink related discoloration or gunk that builds up on your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Harper

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my mouth clean
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this product was going to be useless, but now I find that I am using it every morning before brushing my teeth. It is simple and easy to clean, simply boil it in hot water for 60 seconds. I can feel a difference in my health using this tongue scraper. It seems gross at first to do it, but over time if you keep up with it, your mouth with always is really clean. I like the fact that it is a holistic treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: The best tongue scraper I've ever had, by far.  No really.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few other scrapers, including the 2nd to last one which was stainless w/ a rubber handle and cost more than this one. It wasn't nearly as good. What makes this one so good are two main things, besides it's metallurgy: 1. it's smooth and rounded edge won't hurt your tongue from prolonged use, and 2. the all-metal design means there's no rubber to get dirty and/or wear out as I experienced with the last few. Kudos for a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hua

customer_reviews.title: Having a stainless steel tongue scraper is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! My husband and I started using the plastic tongue scrapers a few months ago and they help significantly with fighting off bad breath. We both vape, and let me tell you, vape tongue is a real thing. With that, and normal eating habits, the bad breath can accumulate. After reading some reviews, we opted to ge these and they work SO much better than the plastic ones. My tongue is nice and pink and I can tell when I don’t use it! I never knew how important a tongue scraper was until I had one in my life. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: FoxiestOfTheLadies

customer_reviews.title: A Super Scraper
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't used to clean my tongue daily until I started practicing ayurveda morning health routines. This is an incredible oral health device. The stainless steel one that I chose is good for any dosha type. That is why I picked it instead of copper which is only good for one type. The price was great and shipping was quick. Where I live, lots of these devices for alternative care are not available, especially the materials that they choose to sell these things of. I choose on line purchases for healthier options.
customer_reviews.author: Lil G

customer_reviews.title: Get tongue germs off fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for scraping off plaque from your tongue. I always hated brushing my tongue because it took forever to see results and I don't like the taste of toothpaste so my gag reflex would act up really fast. I asked my dental hygienist and she recommended a tongue scraper like this one. Ive used it for about a month now and its great. In the morning it completely gets rid of the nasty morning taste fast and my tongue does not at all feel damaged by it, which was a concern of mine. Ive told a few people about it and a few of my family and friends are even considering getting one themself.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and solid construction. I bought this to ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials and solid construction. I bought this to replace my blue plastic tongue scraper I bought from Walmart, which snapped. I still prefer the Walmart designed one because it has a wider scrape width. This one I have to scrape my tongue in three strokes to get across my tongue, which is not any larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jgizzy

customer_reviews.title: Tongue scraper works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I find this tool very useful for cleaning your tongue. It’s satisfying to see all of the build up that accumulates on your tongue even after brushing your tongue with a toothbrush. This tool definitely takes off the build up where your reular toothbrush can’t even touch. It’s pretty amazing and I would highly recommend this product for anyone who would like to go that extra step to have a super clean mouth & breath!
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: A tongue cleaner I actually use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased and then not used tongue cleaners several times over the years. I have a birthmark on my tongue that makes using them painful. However, I think using a tongue cleaner is important for germ removal. I thought I would give this a try. It is a different shape than the others I’ve tried and being stainless steel I liked how sanitary it would be. I actually like this one, it doesn’t bother my tongue at all! I find it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great hygiene tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent product for a good price I never understood how much goo i had on my tounge and how much brushing really doesn’t help sharp enouy to really get a good clean I actually cut my tounge pressing down too hard but that was my falut only thing I would change about this product is i wish it came with a travel bag I store mines in a ziplock for storage
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Richardson

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been brushing my tongue since I was a kid. I've tried those scrubbers on the backs of toothbrushes. Nothing compares to this!!!! it scrapes every thing off of the tongue. doesn't hurt. cleans like instantly with water. there's no "flavor" lol so 5 stars for that... very durable. probably will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Works I guess?
customer_reviews.text: These got pretty good reviews so I thought I'd give them a try. They're alright. I don't see any difference from me just brushing my tongue. In fact, I feel like I have to scrape fairly hard to even see the results I get with just light brushing. I am indifferent about this product. It's definitely not necessary, but if it helps then go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this. Currently I am limited to a few toothpaste that I can use due to allergies. There are no mouthwashes I can use. Because of this my mouth doesn’t feel clean even right after brushing. Also I worry about bad breath since my option are limited on breath freshening products. I bought this hoping it would help keep my mouth fresher. It does. Simple to use. I feel it does make my mouth feel fresher longer than before I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: TTO

customer_reviews.title: A healthier mouth is just a scrape away.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a tongue scraper before, so the idea was a little bit odd to me at first. Needless to say, after trying this product, I will never go back to my old routine again. My mouth has never felt cleaner and my breath is fresher than its ever been. Being that this product is made out of surgical steel, it is much more durable than the other tongue scrapers out there. It is also very easy to clean and maintain. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa G.

customer_reviews.title: Okay scraper
customer_reviews.text: While the scraper is easy to clean, it’s not very wide at all. I have to run it over my tongue more than once. I have a cheap plastic one that works better then this one.
customer_reviews.author: C MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things...
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, my dentist had given me one of these metal tongue cleaners, which I eventually lost and was never able to find another. I had resorted to using drugstore tongue cleaners (which do nothing in comparison to this thing). I highly recommend a metal tongue scraper like this one! Say good bye to tongue bacteria and bad breath!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Super great invention
customer_reviews.text: I love my tongue cleaner and have bought these for other people. My sister didn't seem to like it but I told her to persevere I think she will. She thinks it has to have little teeth along the edge, like the plastic oned. I told her you don't need teeth on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie (Melzie)

customer_reviews.title: easy to use but
customer_reviews.text: it works, easy to use and makes your bad breath less because it scrapes all the gunk off your tongue-buuuut, personally speaking, my bad breath would still be there but milder-much much milder. so using the tongue scraper plus normal brushing and flossing and mouth rinse is perfect. I just realized for me i needed to brush my teeth longer than i was doing and gargle longer too. i dont use listering because it burns my mouth and the chemicals are not safe, i use toms mouth wash- it works just as well but all the chemicals are safe and i feel much better after i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I’d be this impressed with a tongue scraper.
customer_reviews.text: Great tongue scraper, does the trick in one swipe. Felt sharp at first, but soon I was all for it. Can throw in the dishwasher too! Tiny downsides: the detail grooves of the handles can sometimes hold gunk and need extra cleaning, and you’ll need to have a cup wide enough to store the two-handle style in.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Frugal Demanding

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Nice
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this to scrape my tongue. I thought that with the width of the scrapper that I would be unable to comfortably use it but its just fine. Cleaning it is ok, just make sure to check the "corners" on the curve to the handles because particles tend to "cling" there. You will be surprised with what comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Travelers

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I have previously bought the Orabrush rubber tongue scrubber from target for years, but after watching a youtuber rave about this one, I bought one for my boyfriend and I and we both use it and love it so much more than the other one, he used the orabrush a few times ever but now he uses this one everyday, and the quality actually works compared to that one! Please buy this for yourself, wish I had years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: it's alright- a little wide though
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, not sure how much I expected from a tongue scraper... Since the tip of it is rather wide, it can be difficult to reach the backmost part of your tongue (which is the part that I wanted to get at the most :/), but I guess it works fine for the rest of the tongue. I don’t really use it very often but it’s alright.
customer_reviews.author: A Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Took a while but I see its worth
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for me to appreciate it. It didn’t seem to do anything at first. But then I stuck with it and I can honestly say where I see my tongue is cleaner (not a lot because it wasn’t bad before). I do use a mouth rinse that is colour coded though to show muck on my tongue. After I use that then I scrap the residue off with the tongue scrapper. It’s doing it’s job in my dental routine. A bag would have been useful as I store it above my hand basin in a wooden medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pk

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not life-changing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a time when a medical condition was leaving a bad taste in my mouth (before I realized what was going on) and it helps some but not a ton. Still, I think it's a good tool to have. You can get back much farther than with a toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Beth Wade

customer_reviews.title: Best scraper i've had
customer_reviews.text: I used to use plastic scrapers and could never go back now! This design with two handles works so much better because it is easier to use, feels smoother on the tongue, and just overall feels cleaner than plastic scrapers. I believe you can put these in an autoclave for disinfection but as thats not something most have access to I may try dishwashing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Happy and clean :)
customer_reviews.text: I like to follow Ayurvedic medicine (“Ayurveda” for short) which is one of the world's oldest holistic (“whole-body”) healing systems. One of their recommendations is to clean your tongue every morning before you drink anything. I got my BF to start cleaning his tongue too. It is important to use stainless steel. This scraper is sturdy and it looks like it will last because there isn't any plastic pieces. I would always brush my tongue but this scraper gets more bacteria off the tongue then my toothbrush ever would.
customer_reviews.author: Annoyed

customer_reviews.title: Effective...
customer_reviews.text: I'm reading Change your schedule change your life and the book suggested buying one of these. I used a tongue brush prior to this and it wasn't great. I eventually gave up and tossed it. This product definitely works but go easy, as I pressed a little too hard when I started using it and it left my tongue a little tender. Oops...
customer_reviews.author: Helen Gertrude

customer_reviews.title: Very Clean Tongue! Wish it came with a case!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used the plastic tongue cleaners from the department store- those were not sanitary as they were very difficult to clean in all of the nooks and crannies. This tongue scrubber is way more sanitary and easier to clean. I can also reach the back part of my tongue with ease. I only wish it came with a case or a stand of some sort- right now I wash it and place it in a plastic bag after drying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Never realized how dirty my tongue was until I started using this product. I highly recommend it to literally any person.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Emil Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with sensitive gag reflex
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me, but this thing is huge. I guess it does what it’s supposed to but I didn’t notice any significant differences after using it. If you have a very sensitive gag reflex like I do, be very, very careful... or just skip this altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T.

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It works really well at scraping the tongue. It does not hurt and has not caused any irritation. It is a little to large for the back of my mouth and unfortunately does not adjust in size when you squeeze it. It fits my hand well and is very easy to hold. Cleaning is also very east.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: product is wonderful. Not sharp on the tongue
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Recently just started tongue scrapping after looking into the health benefits. My only comment would be that I wish it came in/with some type of case to keep it clean in between uses. It's kind of an awkward shape to find a case for. Otherwise, product is wonderful. Not sharp on the tongue. Size allows to reach a lot of surface area without having to go over the touch multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyedGirl_21

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: My cousin is a hygienist and was giving a tutorial on good hygiene tips and she recommenced this. I cant believe I didn't know about it. I would always buy plastic tongue scrappers and dump them after a month. This can be sterilized and used over and over. I'm happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: useful and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tongue scraper. The handles make it easy to hold and the steel makes it easy to clean. The number of tongue irritations I get have gone down significantly since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: G G

customer_reviews.title: Surgical steel tongue scraper I love it!!  Use it twice a day...
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this product you can not beat it. I was diagnosed with candida which is an overgrowth of yeast and this tongue scraper does a great job. You would not want anything sharper than this surgical steel tongue scraper. you can get farther into the back of the throat to scrape and clean the tongue. I highly recommend this produce. The company emailed me to thank me for my comments and that they appreciated my business. So to the company I thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Big and Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot of positive things about cleaners/scrapers so I bought this and tried using it. Unfortunately, I didn't feel it worked so well because the cleaner/scraper is too big and bulky. However, it was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: A great tool for dental hygiene
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what more to say than this tongue cleaner works wonders. I've had a few others but this is the one I like the most. I've been using for over a year before giving a review. My breath is fresher & I feel like my mouth is extra clean after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to All with a Tongue
customer_reviews.text: Do you ever wake up, look in the mirror, and see a white coating on your tongue? Do you want better breath, even if you think it's good already? Are you pro-oral health? Then this is the product for you! Recommended to everyone with a tongue. Personal note: Brought to visit potential partner on overnight trip; now dating. Coincidence? I think not.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Flexible and as pictured. I use a tongue scraper regularly and wanted to do the environmentally friendly thing and buy stainless steel instead of replacing plastic, but found that my Oralbrush does a better job cleaning. I found this one a tad too short and wide to get the angles and areas I am used to cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Stainless steel is A+ for cleanliness, which means you can reuse this for a long long time. I've had this for a while so the quality is definitely there. Bendable curvature but it stays sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Game changer for dental hygiene.
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. Many thanks to the wellness blogger, Lee from America, who showcased her tongue scraper to her followers. I never knew how much I needed this in my life. Be careful to not scrape down too aggressively!!! It will kind of hurt the next day. Be gentle, but scrape down enough and watch all the nasty bacteria disappear! It's actually quite fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the plastic one I am accustomed to, but if you're use to using plastic, just be careful not to scrape too hard with this one being metal as you will hurt your tongue and can easily make your tongue bleed. It is very good at cleaning off all the gunk though
customer_reviews.author: Hlove

customer_reviews.title: The real deal for a healthy tongue!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal! My dentist gave me a plastic one and it seemed to work okay but my tongue was still white, so I decided to get this tongue scraper. And just as that emphatic reviewer stated, my tongue looks red and healthy! It doesn't hurt and it's very easy to use. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Logan D.

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Mouth; Everyone Wins!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim, not thinking too much about it. But oh boy, does it work! I was equally fascinated and disgusted by the gunk that it took off of my tongue. My mouth has never been cleaner! My breath is better, even in the morning. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says,
customer_reviews.text: I was using a plastic tongue cleaner for years until my recent dental appt. They suggested I start using a metal cleaner since I had a lot of plaque on my tongue and was subconscious about my breath. This tongue cleaner removed much more white film (plaque) from my tongue and it was easy to use, no fuss and no cutting. You have to use commonsense when using it and not apply more pressure than you can handle. I tried using heavy strokes and it still did not cut me.
customer_reviews.author: jessita herriott

customer_reviews.title: eh no thanks
customer_reviews.text: doesnt do anything but make my tongue dry.. idk why this has such high reviews. it doesnt clean my tongue, just takes all the spit and moisture off of it. my toothbrush cleans my tongue better
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Sides

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a tonsillectomy and being older, everyone warned me that recovery would be difficult. Well, they were right- but one of the saving graces was this tongue cleaner! My tongue got so swollen and yucky with medicine/compounded mouthwash build up that I just felt gross no matter how much I would use my toothbrush to clean it. This tongue cleaner worked so well, efficiently, and hygienic. I’m so glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot! It is a good thing that these do not have a rubber grip on them (because rubber grips tend to mold!)....the grip on these are perfectly comfortable without rubber! It works very well to get the gunk off your tongue, and they feel very comfortable gliding along your tongue. Works great, Comfortable, and Easy to Clean! I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Have had one of these for myself for the past couple years and it's been great, durable, easy to clean, and does what it's supposed to do. It still looks as new as the day i got it. Bought one for my girlfriend too and she likes it. I would buy this again in a heartbeat, fortunately I don't have to as I assume it'll last me for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Cicio

customer_reviews.title: Truly a wonderful tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tongue scraper two years ago, and I keep thinking I need to write a review for it because I really like it. This is the best tongue scraper I have ever owned. I've used it twice a day since I bought it, and it is still in pristine shape. It is easy to use and clean, and it will never wear out. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for the perfect tongue scraper!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Use twice a day for best results
customer_reviews.text: This is best used twice a day to get rid of all the icky on your tongue. If you consistently use this product, your breath will immensely improve, and you will be able to taste things better. This scraper has an all metal construction, and it very easy to clean. It is built very well and does not bend under pressure. This is the only tongue scraper you should consider getting, it beats the competitors by far. It would have been nice if a storage case was included.
customer_reviews.author: Onision

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I had been using a plastic tongue ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had been using a plastic tongue scraper purchased from a drug store chain for the last 5 years. This product caught my attention as it is stainless steel and limits the gag reflex. I was "sold" from the first use! I highly recommend this product to anyone who has never tried a tongue scraper and those who did not like using one. Along with brushing and flossing, tongue cleaning really makes your mouth feel super clean and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Errera

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Feeling
customer_reviews.text: Even after just a few uses, mouth certainly feels cleaner and bad breath is a thing of the past. Using this every morning after waking up and brushing seems to help my mouth stay fresher throughout the day regardless of coffee or foods.
customer_reviews.author: JD_Justice

customer_reviews.title: Reusable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tongue scraper for a couple of months now and it hasn’t tarnish. Pretty easy to use and not sharp. Definitely gets the gunk off. Now i can enjoy orange juice in the morning without the weird after brushing taste.
customer_reviews.author: MDsprite

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Got this after reading about how much the tongue gets neglected in oral health. Does what it says it does, is "sharp" without causing any damage, and only takes a couple of passes to clean the tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My super clean tongue
customer_reviews.text: This Tongue scraper is a must have for everyone. Very easy to use, easy to clean and it’s very sturdy . My tongue feels super clean when I use this!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ginsburg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has seriously helped my oral health SO much. I use it every day after I brush my teeth and before I used my mouthwash and it's so awesome. I also love to use it after oil pulling!
customer_reviews.author: biz

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I'm 82 years old, have all my own teeth (except for wisdom teeth and one implant), and have used at least a dozen types of tongue cleaners through the years. This is, hands down, the best: easiest to use, and most effective.
customer_reviews.author: charles corum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Scraper
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about this sooner. Have been using crappy plastic scrapers for a long time. This one can last forever, I bet. I rub down the metal with rubbing alcohol a few times a week to stop any kind of funk from growing on it. No issues. Just a solid scraper that cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: JP08

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tongue cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this. This was recommended to me and I am gladly recommending it to others. Easy to clean does not cut your tongue like some plastic ones I have used before. Very well made and looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: zdelgado

customer_reviews.title: Tongue cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy compared to my previous plastic tongue cleaner. This is easy to clean, does the job magnificently! Cleaning your tongue is so important for your health. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tongue cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself and it’s awesome! Cleans the funk off my tongue. My husband tried it out and he loves it too. I need to buy one from him. I truly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Amber knickman

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your tongue
customer_reviews.text: I've used other tongue cleaners, but never one like this before. It's easy to use, easy to clean and appears like it will hold up well. If purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great! You need one nowb
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. This thing is a game changer. My mouth feels so much cleaner now that I use this! I had a plastic one before and it was not as good as this one!
customer_reviews.author: ALM916

customer_reviews.title: Soooo much better than plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever survive without a tongue scraper? Soooo much better than plastic ones. This will last forever. I use it first thing in the am before I drink any water and follow with brushing my teeth. When you see what comes off your tongue, you will never stop using it!
customer_reviews.author: Patoots

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality build, poor scraping.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my cheap plastic tongue scraper I replaced with this one worked better. I could actually see my tongue getting cleaner. After multiple passes with this scrapper, my tongue still has residue. I feel the edges are just too dull and too much pressure is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get this one.
customer_reviews.text: My First real togue scraper. Felt immediate difference in a good fresh way. It’s really sturdy & durable. Don’t think I’ll have to buy another one really soon, but would definitely buy this one again. Be mindful not to be overzealous and scrape too hard or your tongue will be sore. Gentle does it.
customer_reviews.author: Quancheese

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sanitary tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use and sanitary tongue scraper. Doesn't hurt my tongue or taste buds at all. Works in just a couple of swipes. Very easy to clean as it has smooth edges and you can tell you've gotten it all the way sanitized. The slightly smooth edges of the scraping part make it comfortable but also very effective as scraping stuff off your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! If you want a tongue scrapper get this one. Don't get one with rubber handles bc they will mold. this is easy to clean, does the job well, scrapes off the layer of funk, and is quite fun to use! I love dental hygiene so I recommend this to add into your daily routine! Also great for my fellow coffee drinkers, I don't like the film coffee has after drinking it's delicious goodness. I'll be using this alongside brushing to keep my breath fresh!
customer_reviews.author: melissa burridge

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of this!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this tool. I bought it to try because sometimes when I eat before bed I wake up it horrid morning breath. This tool works pretty slick. You pull this tool over your tongue and ig cleans it. It is easy to use, easy to clean and helps clean your tongue. I am glad I bought this and it really helps!
customer_reviews.author: W. E.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous because of it being steel but I absolutely love it! I hate going through the day with the feeling of something on my tongue especially after a heavy meal or after smoking! I also use this tool in my daily dental hygiene routine! I used to use my toothbrush to clean my tongue but that was too harsh. This tongue cleaner is a nice smooth glide across the tongue and you can see the saliva on it when done! Easy clean up and storage is up to you but if you are a neat freak like me, I store it in a clean area.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to everyday brushing routine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after hearing rave reviews about tongue scrapers from several people who I generally trusted to give me good advice, while fully expecting it to be a sham, or at least significantly overhyped. WOW, was I ever proved wrong by this thing. My mouth has never felt so clean. This is the only tongue scraper I have used but I can't imagine using anything else (ie a plastic one), everything about it superb and leaves my mouth feeling so much fresher than just brushing and using mouthwash. I cannot recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Tongue Scraper & 3-5% Peroxide is a Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This Mug is SERIOUS!!! The Tongue holds so much restful Bacteria that causes bad breath! You can brush all day but if no tongue scraper like this youll just smell like "Mint BooBoo" LBVS!! So amazed by this utensil You live and learn but this is my method Try it! Gargle Mouthwash / Brush Teeth Toothpaste/ Brush Tongue to Loose the germy saliva / Tongue Scrape / Gargle Peroxide/ ( Peroxide is a Miracal in its Own) ReTongueScrape/ Rinse/ Your Breath Will be on a whole new level!!!
customer_reviews.author: seph

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for your mouth hygiene
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this tongue scraper from my friend Lisa and bought one. So glad I did! I use it before I do my oil pulling with my coconut oil in the mornings and then use it when I brush my teeth at night!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs to own this tongue scraper
customer_reviews.text: I love this tongue scraper, I use this and another tongue brush with tongue cleaning gel and my tongue is super pink and clean all the time. Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like
customer_reviews.text: Cut the back of my tongue and it’s not even sharp. Also just left my mouth feeling “weird” after using. Maybe just not for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Tra77

customer_reviews.title: The perforation on the packaging made opening it easy and the scraper slid out without dropping unsanitarily
customer_reviews.text: I just received my tongue scraper quickly from the shipper in a well insulated box. The perforation on the packaging made opening it easy and the scraper slid out without dropping unsanitarily. The instructions state to wash it first, which I did with soap and hot water. I brushed my teeth first (as recommended), and then scraped my tongue efficiently without any pain. I went down my tongue about 3 times and the result was a pinker(/cuter) tongue and a fresher feeling in my mouth. I love this product! All the stars! I'm addicted and can't want to see the long-term impact on the looks and health of my tongue. Cheers to oral health!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: I like the metal version better than the plastic!
customer_reviews.text: The metal version feels like it actually comes clean - I'm happy I bought a quality product that will last a long time, rather than cheapy plastic tongue scraper that I end up tossing out.
customer_reviews.author: P.S.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely awesome! It does exactly what it’s intended to do and I have found myself, loving it! It’s easy to use, clean and sanitize. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Golden Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: This is great for people who frequently get a build up on their tongue. I does help with bad breath but you have to use it consistently. I did not feel any pain when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the good quality of this stainless steel tongue scraper made in India. It has no rubber parts that can attract and retain bacteria. The size is just right and the scraper does a good job cleaning my tongue. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: iVin

customer_reviews.title: Best I've every used
customer_reviews.text: I think I have used every type of tounge cleaner out there through the years. I bought this because it had a high rating and was very very glad I did. This is the one from here on.
customer_reviews.author: Manifestlife

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, even though I didnt know I needed it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. This product is satisfyingly gross to use. I cant believe the amount of gunk that it is able to pull off my tongue. I now have a wonderfully clean tongue everyday and my breath now stays fresher even longer!!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy.smith.of.lou.ky

customer_reviews.title: and I love it as a staple for oral care
customer_reviews.text: A solid tongue cleaner. Came on time with no issues. This will last a very long time, and I love it as a staple for oral care. This one is the perfect width, I have a small mouth and tongue and it still works great, it's not too big and not too small. The material is quality, and I highly recommend investing in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ela S

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tool for tongue health
customer_reviews.text: I use this product in conjunction with brushing my teeth. It really does help keep the tongue clean in conjunction with the toothbrush. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The gunk
customer_reviews.text: wow, this gets rid of everything without pain that's on your tongue....I was disgusted...because the toothbrush left behind what I thought was gone
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Starks

customer_reviews.title: Surgical grade steel, therefore easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Dr Tung scraper in the past. This is much better because there are no plastic/vinyl handles, which the Dr Tung product has. The Dr Tung handles are hard to clean. This whole thing is steel. It looks like a surgical instrument. You could just boil this scraper in a pan of water to sterilize it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use. Never realized how much builds up on my tongue even after using a toothbrush. The way it is designed keeps me from gagging as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was rather surprised how well this worked. For me it's a good size. I thought it wouldn't be sharp enough when I first handled it, but it's pretty good and won't cut your tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Oral Health
customer_reviews.text: I have used a tongue scraper for many years, ever since my dentist gave me a plastic one. This great product is awesome, healthy, and best of all, easy to maintain and sanitary.
customer_reviews.author: KandiJ

product_meta.title: HealthAndYoga(TM) Tongue Cleaner Scraper - Hygienic Seal-Pack – Surgical Grade Stainless Steel, Non-Synthetic Grip – Sterilizable Tongue Brush Cleaner (With Organic Storage Bag)
feature_bullets: FDA Registered. Made of Superior Surgical Grade stainless steel and with Comfort Grip
Seal Packed for Super hygiene. No loose pieces or hand handling
Thicker, heavy duty gauge to ensure it is smooth on the tongue - without risk of nicks
Eliminates Non-hygienic or wearing away Rubber Handles – Only Pure Stainless Steel Carved handles to last a lifetime
Flexible, non-gagging - Suitable tool for plaque removal, bad breath and to restore oral hygiene or taste sensation
